title: B2B/DOT: Easy B2B Products - Product Change
description:
Description
The objective of this portfolio epic is to provide the capability of product change for an easy B2B product portfolio (Company Start / Pro & Business Start / Pro).
It should work for changes inside a product family and across product families of easy product portfolios.
Sequence Diagram:
https://wiki.telekom.de/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=2091361232
  Idea of analyzing:
Understanding what is the overall process
Starting from Flamingo Order to oPOM
Ending in CRMT
Maybe visualize a workflow for that with steps
Understand what LOM capabilities are required today
Maybe visualize a workflow for that with steps
Checking which capabilities are available within MAPIs
What are the differences to LOM?
Which gaps do we have?
